rule.name: Rule template for Clang Static Analyzer custom rules
rule.description:
Follow these steps to make your custom rules available in SonarQube:

    1. Create a new rule in SonarQube by "copying" this rule template and specify the CheckId of your custom rule, a title, a description, and a default severity.
    2. Enable the newly created rule in your quality profile
  1. Relaunch an analysis on your projects, et voil√†, your custom rules are executed!

rule.name: core.CallAndMessage
rule.description:
Check for logical errors for function calls and Objective-C message expressions (e.g., uninitialized arguments, null function pointers)

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: core.DivideZero
rule.description:
Check for division by zero

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: core.NonNullParamChecker
rule.description:
Check for null pointers passed as arguments to a function whose arguments are references or marked with the 'nonnull' attribute

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: core.NullDereference
rule.description:
Check for dereferences of null pointers

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: core.StackAddressEscape
rule.description:
Check that addresses to stack memory do not escape the function

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: core.UndefinedBinaryOperatorResult
rule.description:
Check for undefined results of binary operators

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: core.VLASize
rule.description:
Check for declarations of VLA of undefined or zero size

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

Check for uninitialized values used as branch conditions

rule.description:

rule.description:
Check for uninitialized values being returned to the caller

rule.description:
Check for inner pointers of C++ containers used after re/deallocation

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: cplusplus.Move
rule.description:
Find use-after-move bugs in C++

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: cplusplus.NewDelete
rule.description:
Check for double-free and use-after-free problems. Traces memory managed by new/delete.

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: cplusplus.NewDeleteLeaks
rule.description:
Check for memory leaks. Traces memory managed by new/delete.

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: cplusplus.PlacementNew
rule.description:
Check if default placement new is provided with pointers to sufficient storage capacity

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: cplusplus.PureVirtualCall
rule.description:
Check pure virtual function calls during construction/destruction

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: cplusplus.StringChecker
rule.description:
Checks C++ std::string bugs

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: deadcode.DeadStores
rule.description:
Check for values stored to variables that are never read afterwards

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: fuchsia.HandleChecker
rule.description:
A Checker that detect leaks related to Fuchsia handles

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.name: nullability.NullPassedToNonnull
rule.description:
Warns when a null pointer is passed to a pointer which has a _Nonnull type.

References

clang-analyzer.llvm.org

rule.description:
Warns when a null pointer is returned from a function that has _Nonnull return type.

rule.description:
Warns when a nullable pointer is dereferenced.

Warns when a nullable pointer is passed to a pointer which has a _Nonnull type.

References

rule.name: nullability.NullableReturnedFromNonnull
rule.description:
Warns when a nullable pointer is returned from a function that has _Nonnull return type.

Check for memory leaks, double free, and use-after-free problems. Traces memory managed by malloc()/free().
